setup.missing-mount: The path "{{- path}}" was not mounted properly. All data will be lost when the container is stopped or restarted.
setup.get-started-account: Get started by creating an account
setup.username-requirements: The username must be at least 4 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
setup.password-requirements: The password must be at least 8 characters long
setup.container-engine-explanation: Docker and Podman are supported. You can either add an local or remote container engine.
setup.note-mounted-docker-socket: Has the container engine socket been mounted (-v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock)? Has the container engine been started?
setup.additional-container-engines: You can add additional container engines in the settings
setup.additional-domains-or-hostnames: You can add additional domains and hostnames in the settings
